page.title: 08B.U.P.A. HOSPITAL, THINGWALL
page.content: B.U.P.A. Murrayfield Hospital in {Thingwall,}Wirral was opened in 1982. It is situated 8 miles from Liverpool. It has 41 beds and most of these are single rooms, although there is one room especially for children. For day surgery there are also a two bed unit and a four bed unit. The rooms all have a radio, colour television, telephone and private bathroom. There are two operating theatres with a recovery suite, four consulting rooms, an X-ray department and a portable X-ray machine. There are also a physiotherapy department, pathology department and a pharmacy, which provides all the patients' drugs and medicines.
